sentences.en: And the child herself demonstrated her bladder control by flatly refusing to urinate in a plastic cup.
sentences.cn: 而这个小孩拒绝在塑料杯中撒尿的行为也证明了她的膀胱控制能力。

sentences.en: BPH can lead to complications such as an inability to urinate and urinary tract infection.
sentences.cn: 前列腺肥大并会造成如不能排尿及尿道感染等并发症.

sentences.en: How can I urinate in bed?
sentences.cn: 我怎么能在床上尿 呢 ?

sentences.en: I seem to urinate more often than usual.
sentences.cn: 我排尿次数似乎比以往多.

sentences.en: It hurts when I begin to urinate.
May I use your lavatory I'm bursting ! ie I need to urinate urgently.
sentences.cn: 我可以用用你们的厕所吗--我实在憋不住了.

sentences.en: Mr. Thompson urinate normally now, and is ready for discharge.
sentences.cn: 汤普森先生恢复正常的排尿功能了, 准备出院.

sentences.en: Newborn puppies must be stimulated to defecate and urinate after each feeding.
sentences.cn: 幼犬每次进食后需要被刺激排便.

sentences.en: No, I urinate often during the night too.
sentences.cn: 还有, 我通常都是晚上排尿.

sentences.en: P: How can I urinate in bed?
sentences.cn: 患者: 我怎么能在床上尿 呢 ?

sentences.en: Patients must strain to pass urine and they urinate frequently.
sentences.cn: 病人必须用力才能排尿,且有频尿现象.

sentences.en: Please urinate in the trough, please flush after defecating.
sentences.cn: 请勿尿出槽外, 便后请冲水.

sentences.en: The Buddhist kneels and hopes that the dog will not urinate at this hallowed moment.
sentences.cn: 佛教徒跪下来，心里暗自希望小狗不要在这个神圣的时刻撒尿。

sentences.en: The dog cocked its leg ( against the lamppost ), ie in order to urinate.
sentences.cn: 狗(对着灯柱)抬起一只腿 ( 撒尿 ).

sentences.en: The higher you stand the far you urinate.
They also gave fishermen containers in which to defecate and urinate.
sentences.cn: 他们也给渔民提供盛装粪便和尿液的容器.

sentences.en: When I finally did urinate, the colour was red and it hurt!
sentences.cn: 好不容易尿出来了, 尿尿是红色的!而且尿的时候好痛喔!

trans.tran_en: to get rid of urine from your body
